entry.def: Nitrate is a chemical compound that includes nitrogen and oxygen. Nitrates are used as fertilizers in agriculture.

example.ex: High levels of nitrate occur in eastern England because of the heavy use of fertilizers.
example.tran: 英格兰东部因大量使用化肥导致土壤硝酸盐浓度过高。

means.word_mean: 1. any compound containing the nitrate group (such as a salt or ester of nitric acid)
1. treat with nitric acid, so as to change an organic compound into a nitrate;
